name: Prohibition
description:
Prohibition is a high quality model trained on Public Domain, CC0 licensed Life Magazine and Country Gentleman magazine cover illustrations between 1914 and 1937, but with a primary focus on illustrations produced between 1920 and 1933 during the Prohibition era.

Example prompt (keyword triggers are in bold):

sd-prohib a female bartender in a white shirt, vest and tie making a cocktail during prohibition, medium brushstrokes, painterly, dynamic, family life, idealism, pictorial, country gentleman, 1920, cover art, illustration

Recommended Negative prompt keywords: logo, wordmark, signature, title, text, words, magazine cover

Subtle variations can be produced by reusing the same seed and changing the year:[1914|1920|1924|1925|1928|1930|1933|1934|1937]

switching between [broad brushstrokes|medium brushstrokes|fine brushstrokes]

switching between [country gentleman|life magazine]

and switching between [family life|adventure|romance]

I post about Stable Diffusion, model making and AI at diffusionary.substack.com

meta.prompt: sd-prohib a man in a t-shirt and shorts in a modern looking living room holds his loyal dog for a photograph, broad brushstrokes, painterly, dynamic, adventure, idealism, pictorial, country gentleman, 1920, cover art, illustration
meta.negativePrompt: logo, wordmark, (signature), title, text, words, magazine cover,
